metadata.title: CVE-2024-34030 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:PCI: of_property: Return error for int_map allocation failureReturn -ENOMEM from of_pci_prop_intr_map() if kcalloc() fails to prevent aNULL pointer dereference in this case.[bhelgaas: commit log]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
